meanings.definition: A large group of butterflies and moths with scaled wings.
meanings.sent1: The macrolepidoptera fluttered gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful macrolepidoptera resting on a flower.
meanings.sent3: The macrolepidoptera seemed to be having a tea party on the petals.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as colorful as a macrolepidoptera's wings.
meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the macrolepidoptera's vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The study or collection of large butterflies and moths.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to the study of macrolepidoptera.
meanings.sent2: The museum had an impressive collection of macrolepidoptera specimens.
meanings.sent3: The macrolepidoptera enthusiasts organized a butterfly-themed party.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of macrolepidoptera was as vast as the sky.
meanings.sent5: The book on macrolepidoptera was filled with stunning illustrations.
